snippet: MF Global customers whose assets vanished have received offers to sell their claims and recoup nearly the entire shortfall, people involved in the negotiations said.
abstract: MF Global customers whose assets vanished have received offers to sell their claims and recoup nearly the entire shortfall, people involved in the negotiations said.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and BEN PROTESS

headline.main: MF Global Customers Said to Get Offers for Their Claims
headline.print_headline: MF Global Clients Get Buyout Bids
